text: â€œNdipo adza eni madandaulo (owona) mwa anthu akumidzi (omwe ndi Asilamu) kuti awapatse chilolezo (chosapita ku nkhondo). Koma adakhala (popanda kupempha chilolezo kwa Mtumiki) amene amunamiza Allah ndi Mtumiki Wake. (Amenewa ndi achiphamaso omwe amadzitcha kuti ndi Asilamu pomwe sadali Asilamu). Mwa iwo amene sadakhulupirire Allah chiwapeza chilango chopweteka
